short_description: Get quizzed from your notes via push notifications. Study smarter with AI-powered spaced repetition.
full_description:
Quizifications helps you actually remember what you study by sending push notification quizzes from your own notes throughout the day.

STOP FORGETTING WHAT YOU LEARN
Research shows we forget 70% of new information within 24 hours. Quizifications uses spaced repetition and active recall - proven techniques that boost retention by up to 85%.

HOW IT WORKS
• Upload your notes or choose from pre-built categories
• Our AI generates personalized quiz questions
• Get quizzed via push notifications at your preferred times
• Track your progress and watch your knowledge grow

STUDY GROUPS
Learn together with classmates:
• Create or join groups with up to 20 members
• Share notes with your group
• Compete on weekly leaderboards
• Stay motivated with friends

FEATURES
✓ AI-Generated Questions - No more making flashcards by hand
✓ Push Notification Quizzes - Study in 10-second bursts
✓ Spaced Repetition - Review at optimal intervals
✓ Progress Tracking - See your improvement over time
✓ Pre-Built Categories - SAT prep, science, history, languages & more
✓ Study Windows - Set when you want to be quizzed
✓ Offline Mode - Quiz yourself anywhere

PRICING
• 3-day free trial with full access
• $4.99/month or $39.99/year (save 33%)

Questions? Contact us at matt@quizifications.com
